product information:
The HP LP2465 LCD monitor ensures superior picture quality with its 1920 x 1200p pixels native picture resolution. With 500 nits (cd/m2) brightness level, this HP 24-inch monitor delivers a bright and lively image output. Relish widescreen viewing experience with the 16:10 native aspect ratio of this HP LCD monitor. Watch moving pictures without any blur or distortion with the 6 ms response rate of the HP LP2465 LCD monitor. This HP 24-inch monitor offers a clear visual performance from anywhere in the room, all thanks to its 178Â° horizontal and vertical viewing angle. The 1000:1 contrast ratio of this HP LCD monitor corrects the black and the white levels for an amazing display.
